declaration: template<typename Buffer, typename Shader, typename Window, typename Brush, typename Gpu> struct graphics_boundary_classes;
briefDescription: Contains the boundary classes used to communicate with the GPU in a [[graphics_environment]].

templateParameters.name: Buffer
templateParameters.description: The boundary class representing memory on a GPU.

templateParameters.name: Shader
templateParameters.description: The boundary class representing code on a GPU.

templateParameters.name: Window
templateParameters.description: The boundary class representing a window on a GPU.

templateParameters.name: Brush
templateParameters.description: The boundary class representing a collection of shaders that can be used to draw objects with.

templateParameters.name: Gpu
templateParameters.description:
The boundary class representing a GPU.
Must be a subclass of [[gpu_connection]].
